images.description: The season finale in Abu Dhabi takes place at dusk
Lewis Hamilton strolling through the paddock promoting high fashion is not an unusual sight these days
But this is Abu Dhabi, where the boats are big
But the track is getting more and more bumpy as time goes by, as Carlos Sainz discovered during practice
Much to the delight of the fans, it seems
Race day was much more sedate - as sedate as it can be with ex-F1 team boss Flavio Briatore, Maria Sharapova and Naomi Campbell on the grid
It was Verstappen, however, who provided the entertainment on Sunday
